story.soThat: users can see version history and maintainers can follow release procedures
story.tasks: - Create CHANGELOG.md with v0.1.0 section - Document all features: computeFFT, detectPitch, extractFormants, analyzeSpectrum - Create RELEASING.md with publish procedure - Add pre-release checklist (tests pass, docs updated, version bumped) - Document npm publish command and git tagging - Add versioning strategy (semver)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: AC1: Given v0.1.0 ready, When creating CHANGELOG, Then documents all features in v0.1.0 (FFT, pitch, formants, spectral) AC2: Given changelog complete, When creating RELEASING, Then documents npm publish procedure, versioning strategy, pre-release checklist AC3: Given both files created, When validating, Then follows keepachangelog.com format and includes git tagging instructions

doc.title: PRD - Release Documentation
doc.snippet: CHANGELOG.md following keepachangelog.com. RELEASING.md with publish procedure. Version 0.1.0 initial release with all four DSP functions.

story-context.constraints: - CHANGELOG.md follows keepachangelog.com format - Version 0.1.0 (2025-11-20): - Added: computeFFT with Hanning/Hamming/Blackman windows - Added: detectPitch with YIN algorithm - Added: extractFormants with LPC algorithm - Added: analyzeSpectrum with centroid/rolloff/tilt - Added: TypeScript definitions - Added: iOS and Android native implementations - Added: Comprehensive documentation - Added: Example app with benchmarks - RELEASING.md includes: - Pre-release checklist (tests, docs, version, changelog) - npm publish procedure - Git tagging (git tag v0.1.0, git push --tags) - Versioning strategy (semver: MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH) - Post-release steps (verify on npmjs.com, test install) - Depends on Story 5.6 (package.json version set)

tests.standards: Verify CHANGELOG follows keepachangelog.com format. Verify all v0.1.0 features listed. Test RELEASING procedure is complete and accurate.
tests.locations: Manual review of CHANGELOG.md and RELEASING.md
tests.ideas: - Verify CHANGELOG has "Added" section with all four DSP functions (AC1) - Check CHANGELOG date format (AC3) - Verify RELEASING has pre-release checklist (AC2) - Verify RELEASING has npm publish command (AC2) - Verify git tagging instructions present (AC3) - Verify semver strategy documented (AC2)
